zhCN: 武术家等级 一
enGB: Initiator Level 1

zhCN: 武术家等级 二
enGB: Initiator Level 2

zhCN: 武术家等级 三
enGB: Initiator Level 3

zhCN: 武术家等级 四
enGB: Initiator Level 4

zhCN: 武术家等级 五
enGB: Initiator Level 5

zhCN: 武术家等级 六
enGB: Initiator Level 6

zhCN: 武术家等级 七
enGB: Initiator Level 7

zhCN: 武术家等级 八
enGB: Initiator Level 8

zhCN: 武术家等级 九
enGB: Initiator Level 9

zhCN: 可学习一级的武技和战姿
enGB: Can learn Maneuvers and Stances of Level 1

zhCN: 可学习二级的武技和战姿
enGB: Can learn Maneuvers and Stances of Level 2

zhCN: 可学习三级的武技和战姿
enGB: Can learn Maneuvers and Stances of Level 3

zhCN: 可学习四级的武技和战姿
enGB: Can learn Maneuvers and Stances of Level 4

zhCN: 可学习五级的武技和战姿
enGB: Can learn Maneuvers and Stances of Level 5

zhCN: 可学习六级的武技和战姿
enGB: Can learn Maneuvers and Stances of Level 6

zhCN: 可学习七级的武技和战姿
enGB: Can learn Maneuvers and Stances of Level 7

zhCN: 可学习八级的武技和战姿
enGB: Can learn Maneuvers and Stances of Level 8

zhCN: 可学习九级的武技和战姿
enGB: Can learn Maneuvers and Stances of Level 9

zhCN: 恢复武技
enGB: Recover Maneuvers

zhCN: 恢复一个已耗竭的武技
enGB: Recover one expended Maneuver.

zhCN: 武技专攻
enGB: Maneuver Focus

zhCN:
你的武技特别难以被人招架。
效果：你的所有武技的豁免DC+1
enGB:
Your maneuvers are particualarly hard to resist.
Benefit: Add +1 to the Difficulty Class for all saving throws against your maneuvers.

zhCN: 武技专攻（神话）
enGB: Maneuver Focus (Mythic)

zhCN:
你的神话力量使你的武技更加难以被人招架。
效果：将你的神话等级加入武技豁免DC中。
enGB:
Your mythic power makes your maneuvers harder to resist.
Benefit: Increase the Difficulty Class for resisting your maneuvers by your Mythic Rank.

zhCN: 钢魄之威
enGB: Unnerving Calm

zhCN: 当你的钢魂击技命中时，你可以再次使用此击技。此外，你所有钢魂武技的豁免DC+1。
enGB: When you hit with a Diamond Mind strike you regain the use of that strike. In addition you add +1 to the Difficulty Class for all saving throws against your Diamond Mind maneuvers.

zhCN: 石心之佑
enGB: Iron Heart Aura

zhCN:
你的精神力量和武术训练激励着你周围的人。
效果：当你处于任何铁心姿态时，你周围20尺内的盟友（不包括你自己）豁免检定获得+2士气加值。此外，你所有铁心武技的豁免DC+1。
enGB:
Your strength of spirit and martial training inspires those around you.
Benefit: While you are in any Iron Heart stance, allies (not yourself) in a 20ft-circle around you gain +2 morale bonus to saving throws. In addition you add +1 to the Difficulty Class for all saving throws against your Iron Heart maneuvers.

zhCN: 豁免检定获得+2士气加值。
enGB: +2 morale bonus to saving throws.

zhCN: 磐石之韧
enGB: Endurance of Stone

zhCN: 当你的石龙击技命中时，你恢复1d6点生命值。此外，你所有石龙武技的豁免DC+1。
enGB: When you hit with a Stone Dragon strike you heal for 1d6. In addition you add +1 to the Difficulty Class for all saving throws against your Stone Dragon maneuvers.

zhCN: 血虎之疾
enGB: Tiger Blooded

zhCN: 当你使用虎爪击技时，你获得+3攻击加值。此外，你所有虎爪武技的豁免DC+1。
enGB: Increase your attack bonus by 3 when using Tiger Claw strikes. In addition you add +1 to the Difficulty Class for all saving throws against your Tiger Claw maneuvers.

zhCN: 白鸦之御
enGB: White Raven Defense

zhCN: 当你的白鸦击技命中时，移除30尺范围内盟友困惑、胁迫、情绪、恐惧、震慑和影响心智的状态。此外，你所有白鸦武技的豁免DC+1。
enGB: On hitting with a White Raven strike removes the confused, compulsion, emotion, fear, shaken and mind affecting conditions from allies in a 30 feet radius. In addition you add +1 to the Difficulty Class for all saving throws against your White Raven maneuvers. [Currently no White Raven strike allows a saving throw]

zhCN: 军道之剑
enGB: Warblade

zhCN: 军道之剑生来就是为了战斗。迅速，强壮，持久并且对于战斗技巧的绝对自信，他寻找值得交战的对手来检验自己。
enGB: The warblade was born for conflict. Swift, strong, enduring, and utterly confident in his martial skills, he seeks to test himself against worthy foes.

zhCN: 军道之剑擅长
enGB: Warblade proficiencies

zhCN: 军道之剑擅长使用所有简易和军用的近战（包括当做投掷武器使用的武器）武器、轻甲、中甲以及盾牌（塔盾除外）。
enGB: You are proficient with simple and martial melee weapons (including those that can be used as thrown weapons), light and medium armor, and all shields except tower shields.

zhCN: 军道之剑武技选择
enGB: Warblade Maneuver Selection

zhCN: 在开始时军道之剑会习得3个武技。你可以选择的流派是钢魂，铁心，石龙，虎爪和白鸦。
enGB: You begin your career with knowledge of three martial maneuvers. The disciplines available to you are Diamond Mind, Iron Heart, Stone Dragon, Tiger Claw, and White Raven.

zhCN: 军道之剑战姿选择
enGB: Warblade Stance Selection

zhCN: 在开始时军道之剑会习得1种来自可选流派的战姿。在第4，第10以及第16级你可以选择一个额外的战姿。不像武技，战姿永不耗竭且不需要准备。所有的已知战姿随时都可以使用，你可以用一个迅捷动作来改变你目前使用的战姿。除非在战姿描述中说明，否则战姿视为特异能力。
enGB: You begin with knowledge of one 1st level stance from any discipline open to warblades. At 4th, 10th, and 16th level, you can choose additional stances. Unlike maneuvers, stances are not expended, and you do not have to ready them. All the stances you know are available to you at all times, and you can change the stance you are currently using as a swift action. A stance is an extraordinary ability unless otherwise stated in the stance description.

zhCN: 如臂指使
enGB: Weapon Aptitude

zhCN: 军道之剑将其总军道等级-2作为其战士等级，以便获得{g|Encyclopedia:Feat}专长{/g}。如果其已有战士等级，则这些等级将叠加。
enGB: A Warblade counts his total Warblade level -2 as his fighter levels for the purpose of qualifying for {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}. If he has levels in fighter, these levels stack.

zhCN: 洞若观火
enGB: Battle Clarity (Reflex)

zhCN: 只要你不处于措手不及，你就会在反射豁免获得等同于智力调整值的洞察加值（最高等同于其军道之剑等级）
enGB: As long as you are not flat-footed, you gain an insight bonus equal to your Intelligence bonus (maximum equals your warblade level) on your Reflex saves.

zhCN: 求战似渴
enGB: Battle Ardor

zhCN: 在确认重击的检定中，你获得等同于智力调整值的洞察加值
enGB: You gain an insight bonus equal to your Intelligence bonus on rolls made to confirm critical hits.

zhCN: 难知如阴
enGB: Battle Cunning

zhCN: 当你攻击措手不及或被夹击的敌人时，你在近战伤害检定中获得等同于智力调整值的洞察加值
enGB: You gain an insight bonus equal to your Intelligence bonus on melee damage rolls against flat-footed or flanked opponents.

zhCN: 百战精兵
enGB: Battle Skill

zhCN: 你的战技防御获得等同于智力调整值的洞察加值。
enGB: You gain an insight bonus equal to your Intelligence bonus Combat Maneuver Defense.

zhCN: 相机而动
enGB: Battle Mastery

zhCN: 当你进行借机攻击时，你将在攻击检定和伤害检定上获得等同于于你智力调整值的洞察加值。
enGB: You gain an insight bonus equal to your Intelligence bonus on melee attack rolls and melee damage rolls made whenever you make an attack of opportunity.

zhCN: 融会贯通
enGB: Stance Mastery

zhCN: 20级时，你可以同时启用两种战姿
enGB: At 20th level, you can have two stances active simultaneously.

zhCN: 战姿·侵掠如火
enGB: Punishing Stance

zhCN:
流派：铁心
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 1
你所有的近战攻击都会额外造成1D6伤害。但在AC上承受-2减值。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 1
You deal an extra 1d6 points of damage with all melee attacks and take a -2 penalty to AC.

zhCN: 当你的对手斩向你毫无防备的腿部和侧面时，你狠狠的用你的武器迎面斩下，从你的战姿中获得额外的力量。当你处于此战姿下时，你所有的近战攻击都会额外造成1D6伤害。但在AC上承受-2减值，因为这是一个牺牲防御性来换取力量的战姿。
enGB: You chop down violently with your weapon, lending extra force to your blows. These attacks come at a cost, as your enemies slash at your undefended legs and flanks. While you are in this stance, you deal an extra 1d6 points of damage with all melee attacks. You also take a -2 penalty to AC, because this fighting stance emphasizes power over a defensive posture.

zhCN: 钢筋铁骨
enGB: Stone Bones

zhCN:
流派：石龙
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 1
当你使用此武技时，你将进行一次近战攻击，如果这次攻击命中，你获得DR5/精金，持续1轮。
enGB:
Discipline: Stone Dragon
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 1, Swordsage 1
When you use this maneuver, you make a single melee attack. If this attack hits, you gain damage reduction 5/adamantine for 1 round.

zhCN: 冲锋陷阵
enGB: Charging Minotaur

zhCN:
流派：石龙
武技类别:强化技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 1
此强化技使你能够在冲锋时进行一次冲撞攻击。移动和冲撞攻击都不会引发借机攻击。如常的处理这次冲撞尝试。如果你的力量检定结果超过对手的结果，你除了将目标击退正常距离外，还会造成相当于2d6+你的力量调整值的钝击伤害。假设你的力量检定足够高，你可以将目标击退超过 5 英尺（与冲撞的正常情况相同，但无需跟随）
enGB:
Discipline: Stone Dragon
Maneuver Type: Boost
Required Initiator Level: Warblade 1, Swordsage 1
This boost enables you to make a bull rush attack as part of a charge. Neither the movement nor the bull rush attack provokes attacks of opportunity. Resolve the bull rush attempt normally. If your Strength check exceeds the opponents result, you deal bludgeoning damage equal to 2d6 + your Str modifier in addition to pushing the target back as normal. Assuming your Strength check is high enough, you can push your target back more than 5 feet (as normal for a bull rush, but without having to follow).

zhCN: 心无旁骛
enGB: Steely Strike

zhCN:
流派：铁心
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 1
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。你在这次攻击骰上获得+4的加值，除你的攻击目标以外的敌人在对你的攻击骰上获得+4加值，持续1轮。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 1
You make a single melee attack as part of this strike. You gain a +4 bonus on the attack roll. All opponents other than the one you attacked gain a +4 bonus on attack rolls against you for 1 round.

zhCN: 梦魇剑·青玉
enGB: Sapphire Nightmare Blade

zhCN:
流派：钢魂
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 1
作为此武技的一部分，你需要进行一次察觉检定。检定的DC等同目标生物的AC。然后对目标进行一次近战攻击，同样视为此武技的一部分。如果察觉检定成功，那么目标视为对你的攻击措手不及，同时你还可以造成1d6点额外伤害。如果察觉检定失败，那么此攻击命中检定将受到-2的惩罚并造成正常伤害。
enGB:
Discipline: Diamond Mind
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 1, Swordsage 1
You attempt a Perception check as part of this maneuver, using the target creatures AC as the DC of the check. You then make a single melee attack against your target. The attack is also part of this maneuver. If your Perception check succeeds,  you deal an extra 1d6 points of damage. If your check fails, your attack is made with a -2 penalty and deals normal damage.

zhCN: 战姿·长歌励志
enGB: Bolstering Voice

zhCN:
流派：白鸦
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 1
当你处于此战姿时，范围内所有能听到你的盟友都会在意志豁免中获得+2士气加值，并且在对抗恐惧效果的意志豁免中获得额外的+2士气加值。
enGB:
Discipline: White Raven
Required Initiator Level: Warblade 1
While you are in this stance, all allies within range who can hear you gain a +2 morale bonus on Will saves, and an additional +2 morale bonus on Will saves against fear effects.

zhCN: 当你的盟友处于此战姿时，你将在意志豁免中获得 +2 士气加值，并且在对抗恐惧效果的意志豁免中获得额外的 +2 士气加值。
enGB: While your ally is in this stance, you gain a +2 morale bonus on Will saves, and an additional +2 morale bonus on Will saves against fear effects.

zhCN: 领军破敌
enGB: Leading the Attack

zhCN:
流派：白鸦
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 1
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。如果你的攻击成功命中，则你的盟友在1轮内对被你击中的生物进行攻击检定时获得+4士气加值。
enGB:
Discipline: White Raven
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 1
As part of this maneuver, you make a single melee attack. If your attack is successful, your allies gain a +4 morale bonus on attack rolls for 1 round against the creature you hit.

zhCN: 一马当先
enGB: Battle Leaders Charge

zhCN:
流派：白鸦
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 3 贤者之剑 3
作为此武技的一部分，你向目标发起一次冲锋攻击。在冲锋过程中的移动不会引发借机攻击。如果你的冲锋攻击命中，则会造成额外10点伤害。
enGB:
Discipline: White Raven
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 3, Swordsage 3
As part of this maneuver, you charge an opponent. You do not provoke attacks of opportunity for moving as part of this charge. If your charge attack hits, it deals an extra 10 points of damage.

zhCN: 捧星摘月
enGB: Claw at the Moon

zhCN:
流派：虎爪
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 3 贤者之剑 3
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次跳跃检定来跳入空中，接着进行一次针对你决定的目标的上身或脖子的近战攻击。跳跃检定的DC相当于目标的AC。如果这次检定成功，你能造成额外2D6伤害。如果这次攻击造成重击威胁，你在确认重击骰上获得+4加值。如果你的检定失败，你仍然能正常攻击，但不会造成额外伤害或在确认重击骰上获得加值。此武技依然视做被消耗。
enGB:
Discipline: Tiger Claw
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 3, Swordsage 3
As part of this maneuver, you attempt a Jump check to leap into the air and make a melee attack that targets your foe's upper body, face, and neck. The Jump check's DC is equal to your target's AC. If this check succeeds, your attack deals an extra 2d6 points of damage. If this attack threatens a critical hit, you gain a +4 bonus on your roll to confirm the critical hit. If your check fails, you can still attack, but you do not deal extra damage or gain a bonus on a roll to confirm a critical hit. The maneuver is still considered expended.

zhCN: 摘星妙手
enGB: Disarming Strike

zhCN:
流派：铁心
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 3 贤者之剑 3
此武技让你可以同时进行正常攻击和缴械。作为武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击，如果这次攻击命中并造成伤害，你能够立刻尝试卸除对手的武器。这次缴械不会导致借机攻击，你的对手也没有机会反过来卸除你的武器。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 3, Swordsage 3
This maneuver allows you to combine a disarm attempt with a normal attack. You make a single melee attack as part of this strike. If this attack hits and deals damage, you can also attempt to disarm your opponent (PH 155). This disarm attempt does not provoke attacks of opportunity, nor is there any risk that your foe can disarm you.

zhCN: 隔山打牛
enGB: Emerald Razor

zhCN:
流派：钢魂
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 3 贤者之剑 3
对目标进行一次接触近战攻击，如果命中会造成正常的近战武器伤害。
enGB:
Discipline: Diamond Mind
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 3, Swordsage 3
Required Maneuvers: 1 Diamond Mind
Make a single touch attack against an opponent. If you hit, you deal normal melee weapon damage.

zhCN: 摧枯拉朽
enGB: Mountain Hammer

zhCN:
流派：石龙
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 3 贤者之剑 3
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击，这次攻击造成额外2D6伤害并自动克服伤害减免和硬度。
enGB:
Discipline: Stone Dragon
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 3, Swordsage 3
As part of this maneuver, you make a single melee attack. This attack deals an extra 2d6 points of damage and automatically overcomes damage reduction and hardness.

zhCN: 如狼似虎
enGB: Rabid Wolf Strike

zhCN:
流派：虎爪
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 3 贤者之剑 3
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击，你在这次攻击的攻击检定上获得+4加值并额外造成2D6点伤害，同时你在AC上承受-4减值直到下一轮结束。
enGB:
Discipline: Tiger Claw
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 3, Swordsage 3
As part of this maneuver, you make a single melee attack. You gain a +4 bonus on this attack roll and deal an extra 2d6 points of damage. You take a -4 penalty to AC until the start of your next turn.

zhCN: 重若千钧
enGB: Stone Vise

zhCN:
流派：石龙
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 3 贤者之剑 3
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。此次攻击造成额外1d6点伤害。你的攻击还会使目标的速度在1轮内降至0英尺。它可以正常进行其他行动。被击中的生物进行一次强韧豁免（DC= 12+你的力量调整值）成功可以无效此效果，但不能豁免额外伤害。
enGB:
Discipline: Stone Dragon
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 3, Swordsage 3
As part of this maneuver, you make a single melee attack. This attack deals an extra 1d6 points of damage. Your attack also drops the target's speed to 0 feet for 1 round. It can otherwise act normally. A successful Fortitude save (DC 12 + your Str modifier) by the creature struck negates the immobilization, but not the extra damage.

zhCN: 移动速度被重若千钧降至0。
enGB: Movement set to 0 by Stone Vise.

zhCN: 战姿·铁马金戈
enGB: Absolute Steel

zhCN:
流派：铁心
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 5
需求武技：一种铁心流武技
当你处于此战姿中时，你在移动速度上获得10尺增强加值。如果在你的行动轮中你至少移动了10尺，你将在AC上获得+2闪避加值，这持续到你下一轮开始行动之前。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 5
Required Maneuvers: 1 Iron Heart
While you are in this stance, you gain a +10-foot enhancement bonus to your speed. If you move at least 10 feet during your turn, you gain a +2 dodge bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn.

zhCN: 斩钉截铁
enGB: Exorcism of Steel

zhCN:
流派：铁心
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 5
需求武技：一种铁心流武技
当使用此武技时，你将尝试击破对手的武器，这不会引发借机攻击。如果你的尝试成功，对手在1分钟内近战伤害骰上承受-4减值。武器的持有者可以通过一个意志豁免检定（DC= 13+力量调整值）来将此减值减半。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 5
Required Maneuvers: 1 Iron Heart
When you initiate this maneuver, you attack your opponent's weapon. If you succeed, your foe takes a -4 penalty on melee damage rolls for 1 minute. The wielder of the weapon can attempt a Will save (DC 13 + your Str modifier) to halve this penalty.

zhCN: 削铁如泥
enGB: Flesh Ripper

zhCN:
流派：虎爪
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 5 贤者之剑 5
需求武技：两种虎爪流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。如果这次攻击命中，目标必须通过一个强韧豁免检定（DC= 13+力量调整值）否则将在攻击骰和AC上承受-4罚值，持续1轮。如果你的攻击造成重击，这种惩罚将持续的时间相当于你武器的重击倍数。此武技仅对可以被重击的生物有效。
enGB:
Discipline: Tiger Claw
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 5, Swordsage 5
Required Maneuvers: 2 Tiger Claw
As part of this maneuver, you make a melee attack against a single opponent. If this attack hits, the target must make a successful Fortitude save (DC 13 + your Str modifier) or take a -4 penalty on attacks and to AC for 1 round. If your attack is a critical hit, these penalties last for a number of rounds equal to your weapon's critical multiplier. This maneuver functions only against creatures that are vulnerable to critical hits.

zhCN: 虎啸山林
enGB: Lion's Roar

zhCN:
流派：虎爪
武技类别:强化技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 5
需求武技：两种虎爪流武技
你和60尺内的盟友在伤害掷骰中获得+5士气加成，持续1轮。
enGB:
Discipline: Tiger Claw
Maneuver Type: Boost
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 5
Required Maneuvers: 2 Tiger Claw
You and allies within 60 feet gain a +5 morale bonus on damage rolls for 1 round.

zhCN: 断筋折骨
enGB: Bonesplitting Strike

zhCN:
流派：石龙
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 7 贤者之剑 7
需求武技：两种石龙流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。如果你的攻击命中，目标除了正常伤害外还将承受2点体质伤害。
enGB:
Discipline: Stone Dragon
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 7, Swordsage 7
Required Maneuvers: 2 Stone Dragon
As part of this maneuver, you make a single melee attack. If your attack hits, the target takes normal damage as well as 2 points of Constitution damage.

zhCN: 矫若游龙
enGB: Bounding Assault

zhCN:
流派：钢魂
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 7 贤者之剑 7
需求武技：两种钢魂流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你进行两次移动动作，在移动结束后，你可以进行一次近战攻击。在此攻击中你获得+2加值。
enGB:
Discipline: Diamond Mind
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 7, Swordsage 7
Required Maneuvers: 2 Diamond Mind
As part of this maneuver, make a double move. After you move, you can also make a melee attack. You gain a +2 bonus on this attack.

zhCN: 丧心破胆
enGB: Mind Strike

zhCN:
流派：钢魂
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 7 贤者之剑 7
需求武技：两种钢魂流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。如果该攻击命中，目标必须进行一次意志豁免检定（DC= 14+角色力量调整值），如果目标没有通过意志豁免检定，将承受1d4点感知伤害。
enGB:
Discipline: Diamond Mind
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 7, Swordsage 7
Required Maneuvers: 2 Diamond Mind
As part of this maneuver, make a melee attack. If this attack hits, your target must make a Will save (DC 14 + your Str modifier) or take 1d4 points of Wisdom damage.

zhCN: 横扫千军
enGB: Mithral Tornado

zhCN:
流派：铁心
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 7 贤者之剑 7
需求武技：两种铁心流武技
当你使用此武技时，你对所有与你相邻的对手进行一次近战攻击。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 7
Required Maneuvers: 2 Iron Heart
When you initiate this strike, you make a melee attack against every opponent adjacent to you.

zhCN: 势若山崩
enGB: Overwhelming Mountain Strike

zhCN:
流派：石龙
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 7 贤者之剑 7
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。这次攻击造成2D6点额外伤害，还会使敌人恍惚一轮，除非其成功通过强韧豁免检定（DC= 14+力量调整值）。
enGB:
Discipline: Stone Dragon
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 7, Swordsage 7
As part of this maneuver, you make a melee attack. This attack deals an extra 2d6 points of damage. Your attack also staggers the target for 1 round unless it makes a successful Fortitude save (DC 14 + your Str modifier).

zhCN: 梦魇剑·红玉
enGB: Ruby Nightmare Blade

zhCN:
流派：钢魂
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 7 贤者之剑 7
需求武技：两种钢魂流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你需要进行一次察觉检定。检定的DC等同目标生物的AC。然后对目标进行一次近战攻击，同样视为此武技的一部分。如果察觉检定成功，那么你将造成双倍伤害。如果察觉检定失败，那么此攻击命中检定将受到-2的惩罚并造成正常伤害。
enGB:
Discipline: Diamond Mind
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 7, Swordsage 7
Required Maneuvers: 2 Diamond Mind
You attempt a Perception check as part of this maneuver, using the target creatures AC as the DC of the check. You then make a single melee attack against your target. The attack is also part of this maneuver. If your Perception check succeeds, you deal double damage. If your check fails, your attack is made with a -2 penalty and deals normal damage.

zhCN: 鹰击长空
enGB: White Raven Strike

zhCN:
流派：白鸦
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 7 贤者之剑 7
需求武技：一种白鸦流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。如果击中，你将造成额外的4d6点伤害，并且目标在下一回合开始前将被视为措手不及。
enGB:
Discipline: White Raven
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 7
Required Maneuvers: 1 White Raven
As part of this maneuver, you make a single melee attack. If it hits, you deal an extra 4d6 points of damage, and the target is considered flat-footed until the start of his next turn.

zhCN: 战姿·轻舒猿臂
enGB: Dancing Blade Form

流派：铁心
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 9
需求武技：两种铁心流武技

enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart

Required Maneuvers: 2 Iron Heart

Maneuver Type: Boost

Discipline: Iron Heart
Maneuver Type: Strike

Discipline: Diamond Mind
Maneuver Type: Strike

enGB:
Discipline: Stone Dragon
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 9, Swordsage 9
Required Maneuvers: 2 Stone Dragon

enGB: Hearing the Air

enGB: Pouncing Charge

作为此武技的一部分，你向目标发起一次冲锋攻击。在冲锋结束后，你可以进行整轮攻击，而不是仅一次攻击。
enGB:
Discipline: Tiger Claw
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 9, Swordsage 9
Required Maneuvers: 2 Tiger Claw
As part of initiating this maneuver, you make a charge attack. Instead of making a single attack at the end of your charge, you can make a full attack.

zhCN: 泰山压顶
enGB: Crushing Vise

武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 11 贤者之剑 11
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。此次攻击造成额外4d6点伤害。你的攻击还会使目标的速度在1轮内降至0英尺。它可以正常进行其他行动。
enGB:
Discipline: Stone Dragon
Maneuver Type: Strike 
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 11, Swordsage 11
As part of this maneuver, you make a melee attack. This attack deals an extra 4d6 points of damage. Your attack also drops the target's speed to 0 feet for 1 round. It can act normally in all other ways.

zhCN: 铁骨铮铮
enGB: Iron Bones

需求武术家等级：军道之剑 11 贤者之剑 11

zhCN: 心如铁石
enGB: Iron Heart Endurance

需求武术家等级：军道之剑 11
需求武技：两种铁心流武技

enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Maneuver Type: Boost
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 11
Required Maneuvers: 2 Iron Heart
Initiate this maneuver to heal hit points equal to twice your level.

zhCN: 山崩地裂
enGB: Irresistible Mountain Strike

流派：石龙
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 11 贤者之剑 11
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。这次攻击造成4D6点额外伤害，还会使敌人恍惚一轮，除非其成功通过强韧豁免检定（DC= 15+力量调整值）。
enGB:
Discipline: Stone Dragon
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 11, Swordsage 11
As part of this maneuver, you make a melee attack. This attack deals an extra 4d6 points of damage. Your attack also staggers the target for 1 round unless it makes a successful Fortitude save (DC 16 + your Str modifier).

zhCN: 猛虎下山
enGB: Rabid Bear Strike

流派：虎爪
武技类别:击技

需求武技：两种虎爪流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击，你在这次攻击的攻击检定上获得+4加值并能造成额外10D6点伤害，同时你在AC上承受-4减值直到下一轮结束。
enGB:
Discipline: Tiger Claw
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 11, Swordsage 11
Required Maneuvers: 2 Tiger Claw
As part of this maneuver, you make a single melee attack. You gain a +4 bonus on this attack roll and deal an extra 10d6 points of damage. You take a -4 penalty to AC until the start of your next turn.

zhCN: 一骑当千
enGB: War Leader's Charge

zhCN:
流派：白鸦
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 6
需求武技：两种白鸦流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你向目标发起一次冲锋攻击。在冲锋过程中的移动不会引发借机攻击。如果你的冲锋攻击命中，则会造成额外35点伤害。
enGB:
Discipline: White Raven
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 6
Required Maneuvers: 2 White Raven
As part of this maneuver, you charge an opponent. You do not provoke attacks of opportunity for moving as part of this charge. If your charge attack hits, it deals an extra 35 points of damage.

zhCN: 摧金断玉
enGB: Ancient Mountain Hammer

流派：石龙
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 13 贤者之剑 13
需求武技：三种石龙流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。这次攻击造成额外12D6伤害并自动克服伤害减免和硬度。
enGB:
Discipline: Stone Dragon
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 13, Swordsage 13
Required Maneuvers: 3 Stone Dragon
As part of this maneuver, you make a single melee attack. This attack deals an extra 12d6 points of damage and automatically overcomes damage reduction and hardness.

zhCN: 万刃奔雷
enGB: Avalanche of Blades

zhCN:
流派：钢魂
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 13
需求武技：三种钢魂流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。如果该攻击命中，你可以对敌人进行一次攻击，但攻击检定承受－4减值。如果这次攻击也命中，你可以对敌人再进行一次攻击，但攻击检定承受－8减值。以此类推，可以进行多次额外攻击，直到攻击未命中为止。
enGB:
Discipline: Diamond Mind
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 13
Required Maneuvers: 3 Diamond Mind
As part of this maneuver, you make a single melee attack against an opponent. If that attack hits, you can then make another attack against that foe with a -4 penalty on your attack roll. If that attack hits, you can make another attack against that opponent with a -8 penalty. You continue to make additional attacks, each one with an additional -4 penalty, until you miss.

zhCN: 白虹贯日
enGB: Colossus Strike

zhCN:
流派：石龙
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 13
需求武技：两种种石龙流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。此攻击造成额外6D6伤害并且被攻击的生物必须通过一次强韧豁免检定（DC= 17+你的力量调整值），否则将被投出1D4个方格外并跌倒在那里。
enGB:
Discipline: Stone Dragon
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 13
Required Maneuvers: 2 Stone Dragon
As part of this maneuver, you make a melee attack against your foe. This attack deals an extra 6d6 points of damage, and the creature struck must succeed on a Fortitude save (DC 17 + your Str modifier) or be hurled 1d4 squares away from you, falling prone in that square.

zhCN: 落井下石
enGB: Finishing Move

zhCN:
流派：铁心
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 13
需求武技：三种铁心流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。这次攻击将造成额外4D6伤害。如果目标的当前生命值小于它的最大生命值，这次攻击将造成额外6D6伤害而不是4D6，如果它的当前生命值为它的最大生命值的一半或更少，这次攻击将造成14D6额外伤害而不是6D6。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 13
Required Maneuvers: 3 Iron Heart
As part of this maneuver, you make a melee attack against a creature. This attack deals an extra 4d6 points of damage. If the target's current hit points are less than its full normal hit points, the attack instead deals an extra 6d6 points of damage. If its hit points are equal to or less than one-half its full normal hit points, the attack instead deals an extra 14d6 points of damage.

zhCN: 断其手足
enGB: Hamstring Attack

zhCN:
流派：虎爪
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 13 贤者之剑 13

作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。如果这次攻击命中，除了造成正常伤害外，目标还将受到1D8点敏捷伤害，并在移动速度上-10尺，持续1分钟。成功的强韧豁免检定（DC= 17+你的力量调整值）能使敏捷伤害和移动速度惩罚均减半。
enGB:
Discipline: Tiger Claw
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 13, Swordsage 13
Required Maneuvers: 3 Tiger Claw
As part of this maneuver, you make a single melee attack. If this attack hits, it deals damage as normal. In addition, the target takes 1d8 points of Dexterity damage and a -10-foot penalty to speed for 1 minute. A successful Fortitude save (DC 17 + your Str modifier) halves both the Dexterity damage and the speed penalty.

Required Initiater Level: Warblade 1, Swordsage 1
As long as you are in this stance, you gain Blindsense up to 30ft.

zhCN: 双管齐下
enGB: Steel Wind

zhCN:
流派：铁心
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 1 贤者之剑 1
当你使用此武技时，你将进行两次次近战攻击，分别攻击两个处于你威胁范围内的敌人。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 1, Swordsage 1
As you initiate this strike, you make two melee attacks, each against a different foe that you threaten.

zhCN: 疾风迅雷
enGB: Adamantine Hurricane

zhCN:
流派：铁心
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 15 贤者之剑 15
需求武技：三种铁心流武技
当你使用此武技时，你将对每一个处于你威胁范围内的敌人进行两次次近战攻击，这些攻击使用你的最高基础攻击加值且获得+4加值。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 15
Required Maneuvers: 3 Iron Heart
You make two melee attacks against each adjacent opponent you threaten when you initiate this maneuver. You receive a +4 bonus on each of these attacks, which are otherwise made with your highest attack bonus.

zhCN: 梦魇剑·金刚
enGB: Diamond Nightmare Blade

zhCN:
流派：钢魂
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 15 贤者之剑 15
需求武技：三种钢魂流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你需要进行一次察觉检定。检定的DC等同目标生物的AC。然后对目标进行一次近战攻击，同样视为此武技的一部分。如果察觉检定成功，那么你将造成四倍伤害。如果察觉检定失败，那么此攻击命中检定将受到-2的惩罚并造成正常伤害。
enGB:
Discipline: Diamond Mind
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 15, Swordsage 15
Required Maneuvers: 3 Diamond Mind
You attempt a Perception check as part of this maneuver, using the target creatures AC as the DC of the check. You then make a single melee attack against your target. The attack is also part of this maneuver. If your Perception check succeeds, you deal four times damage. If your check fails, your attack is made with a -2 penalty and deals normal damage.

zhCN: 震天撼地
enGB: Earthstrike Quake

zhCN:
流派：石龙
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 15 贤者之剑 15
需求武技：两种石龙流武技
你通过强力的攻击将气导向大地，使大地产生惊人的震动。在这种武技发动时，任何站在地面上的生物必须通过反射豁免检定（DC= 18+力量调整值）否则将被震倒在地。
enGB:
Discipline: Stone Dragon
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 15, Swordsage 15
Required Maneuvers: 2 Stone Dragon
You channel ki into the earth with your mighty strike, causing the ground to rumble and shake briefly. Anyone in a 20 feet area must make a successful Reflex save (DC 18 + your Str modifier) or be knocked prone.

zhCN: 飞燕回廊
enGB: Boomerang Throw

zhCN:
流派：铁心
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 1
将武器投掷向近距离的目标敌人。造成正常的武器伤害。攻击后武器会回到你的手中。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 1
Throw your weapon at target enemy in close range. You deal normal weapon damage. After the attack the weapon returns to your hand.

zhCN: 雁字回时
enGB: Vicious Throw

zhCN:
流派：铁心
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 5
需求武技：一种铁心流武技
将武器投掷向近距离的目标敌人。额外造成2d8额外伤害。攻击后武器会回到你的手中。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 5
Required Maneuvers: 1 Iron Heart
Throw your weapon at target enemy in medium range. You deal 2d8 extra damage. After the attack the weapon returns to your hand.

zhCN: 千回百转
enGB: Lightning Throw

zhCN:
流派：铁心
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 15
需求武技：两种铁心流武技
当你使用此武技时，你将进行一次近战攻击，此攻击将对30尺范围内的每个生物造成相当于你正常近战伤害的伤害，外带12D6点额外伤害，在攻击范围内的生物可以进行一次反射豁免检定，DC相当于你的攻击骰结果，通过此检定可以使伤害减半。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 15
Required Maneuvers: 2 Iron Heart
When you use this strike, you make a single melee attack. You deal damage to each creature in a 30 foot line equal to your normal melee damage, plus an extra 12d6 points of damage. Each creature in the attack's area can make a Reflex save with a DC equal to the result of your attack roll. A successful save halves the damage dealt.

zhCN: 战姿·无懈可击
enGB: Strength of Stone

zhCN:
流派：石龙
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 15 贤者之剑 15
需求武技：三种石龙流武技
当你在此战姿中时，你免疫重击。
enGB:
Discipline: Stone Dragon
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 15, Swordsage 15
Required Maneuvers: 3 Stone Dragon
While you are in this stance you are immune to critical hits.

zhCN: 战姿·兵来将挡
enGB: Supreme Blade Parry

zhCN:
流派：铁心
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 15
需求武技：三种铁心流武技
当你在此战姿中时，你获得DR5/-。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 15
Required Maneuvers: 3 Iron Heart
While you are in this stance, you gain damage reduction 5/-.

zhCN: 战姿·蜂集蚁聚
enGB: Swarm Tactics

zhCN:
流派：白鸦
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 15
需求武技：一种白鸦流武技
当你在此战姿中时，相邻敌人将在AC上获得－5减值。
enGB:
Discipline: White Raven
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 15
Required Maneuvers: 1 White Raven
While you are in this stance adjacent enemies gain -5 to AC.

zhCN: 在AC上获得－5减值
enGB: Getting -5 to AC.

zhCN: 溃不成军
enGB: White Raven Hammer

zhCN:
流派：白鸦
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 15
需求武技：三种白鸦流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你对一个敌人进行一次毁灭性的打击。这一击的原始力量足以将其击昏。你的攻击造成额外6d6点伤害，并使你的对手震慑1轮。
enGB:
Discipline: White Raven
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 15
Required Maneuvers: 3 White Raven
As part of this maneuver, you make a single, devastating strike against an opponent. The raw force of this blow knocks him senseless. Your attack deals an extra 6d6 points of damage and stuns your opponent for 1 round.

zhCN: 夺魂追命
enGB: Feral Death Blow

zhCN:
流派：虎爪
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 17 贤者之剑 17
需求武技：四种虎爪流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你需要进行一次运动检定。检定的DC等同目标生物的AC。如果检定成功，则你可以对你的敌人进行一次近战攻击，同样视为此武技的一部分。目标在此攻击中被视为措手不及。如果你的攻击造成伤害，你的目标必须尝试进行强韧豁免检定（DC= 19 + 你的力量调整值）。如果豁免失败，你的目标立即被杀死。如果豁免成功，则除了你的正常武器伤害外，你还会对目标造成额外的20d6点伤害。免疫重击的生物免疫此攻击的即死效果。
enGB:
Discipline: Tiger Claw
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 17, Swordsage 17
Required Maneuvers: 4 Tiger Claw
As part of this maneuver, make a Athletics check with a DC equal to your opponent's AC. If the check succeeds, you can then make a single melee attack against your foe, also as part of this maneuver. The target is considered flat-footed against this attack. If your attack deals damage, your target must attempt a Fortitude save (DC 19 + your Str modifier). If this save fails, your target is instantly slain. If the save is successful, you deal an extra 20d6 points of damage to the target in addition to your normal weapon damage. Creatures immune to critical hits are immune to the death effect of this strike.

zhCN: 一锤定音
enGB: Mountain Tombstone Strike

zhCN:
流派：石龙
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 17 贤者之剑 17
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。如果你的攻击命中，目标除了正常伤害外还将承受2d6点体质伤害。
enGB:
Discipline: Stone Dragon
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 17, Swordsage 17
As part of this maneuver, you make a single melee attack. If this attack hits, you deal 2d6 points of Constitution damage in addition to your normal damage.

zhCN: 天外飞仙
enGB: Strike of Perfect Clarity

zhCN:
流派：铁心
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 17
需求武技：四种铁心流武技
作为此武技的一部分，你进行一次近战攻击。如果你的攻击命中，则会造成额外100点伤害。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 17
Required Maneuvers: 4 Iron Heart
You make a single melee attack as part of this strike. If your attack hits, it deals an extra 100 points of damage.

zhCN: 花开并蒂
enGB: Time Stands Still

zhCN:
流派：钢魂
武技类别:击技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 17
需求武技：四种钢魂流武技
此武技使你连续发动两次整轮攻击。
enGB:
Discipline: Diamond Mind
Maneuver Type: Strike
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 17
Required Maneuvers: 4 Diamond Mind
You make two Full Attacks in a row.

zhCN: 三尺剑围
enGB: Wall of Blades

zhCN:
流派：钢魂
武技类别:应对技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 3
当此应对技激活时，你可以尝试格挡来袭的攻击。当你在一轮内受到第一次攻击时，消耗两个武技点格挡攻击。每次成功的格挡都会为一轮内的后续格挡增加-1减值。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Maneuver Type: Counter
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 3
While this counter is active you attempt to parry incoming attacks. Uses two maneuver points when you are being attacked for the first time in a round.

zhCN: 三尺剑围已激活
enGB: Wall of Blades active

zhCN: 三尺剑围消耗了两个武技点
enGB: Spent 2 maneuver points on Wall of Blades

zhCN: 迅雷回火
enGB: Lightning Recovery

zhCN:
流派：铁心
武技类别:应对技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 7
如果你的近战攻击检定失败，你可以激活此武技以重掷攻击检定并额外获得+2加值。每次近战攻击检定失败都会消耗一个武技点来重掷检定。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Maneuver Type: Counter
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 7
Required Maneuvers: 2 Iron Heart
If one of your melee attacks misses, you can initiate this maneuver to reroll that attack roll with a +2 bonus. Uses a maneuver point whenever you miss an attack.

zhCN: 迅雷回火消耗了一个武技点
enGB: Spent 1 maneuver point on Lightning Recovery

zhCN: 心如铁石已激活
enGB: Iron Heart Focus

zhCN:
流派：铁心
武技类别:应对技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 9
需求武技：两种铁心流武技
当此应对技激活时，你可以重掷任何失败的豁免检定。当你在一轮内第一次豁免检定失败时，消耗两个武技点重掷检定。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Maneuver Type: Counter
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 9
Required Maneuvers: 2 Iron Heart
While this counter is active you can retry any saving throw once. Uses two maneuver points when you fail a saving throw for the first time in a round.

zhCN: 心如铁石已激活
enGB: Iron Heart Focus active

zhCN: 心如铁石消耗了两个武技点
enGB: Spent 2 maneuver points on Iron Heart Focus

zhCN: 心潮澎湃
enGB: Rapid Counter

zhCN:
流派：钢魂
武技类别:应对技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 9 贤者之剑 9
当此应对技激活时，你在一轮内可以进行无限次借机攻击次数。当你在一轮内第一次消耗光借机攻击次数时时，消耗一个武技点激活此效果。
enGB:
Discipline: Diamond Mind
Maneuver Type: Counter
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 9, Swordsage 9
While this counter is active you can make an unlimited amount of attacks of opportunity in a round. Uses a maneuver point when you would run out of attacks of opportunity for the first time in a round.

zhCN: 心潮澎湃已激活
enGB: Rapid Counter active

zhCN: 心潮澎湃消耗了一个武技点
enGB: Spent 1 maneuver points on Rapid Counter

zhCN: 撩蜂剔蝎
enGB: Manticore Parry

zhCN:
流派：铁心
武技类别:应对技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 11
需求武技：两种铁心流武技
当此应对技激活时，你可以尝试格挡来袭的攻击，如果格挡成功则将此攻击改为击中相邻的敌人。当你在一轮内受到第一次攻击时，消耗两个武技点格挡攻击。每次成功的格挡都会为一轮内的后续格挡增加-1减值。
enGB:
Discipline: Iron Heart
Maneuver Type: Counter
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 11
Required Maneuvers: 2 Iron Heart
While this counter is active you attempt to parry incoming attacks with melee weapon attacks, if your parry succeeds the attacks hits an adjacent enemy instead. Uses two maneuver points when you are being attacked for the first time in a round.

zhCN: 撩蜂剔蝎消耗了两个武技点
enGB: Spent 2 maneuver points on Manticore Parry

zhCN: 锲而不舍
enGB: Diamond Defense

zhCN:
流派：钢魂
武技类别:应对技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 15 贤者之剑 15
当此应对技激活时，你在所有豁免上获得+9加值。每轮消耗一个武技点维持此效果。
enGB:
Discipline: Diamond Mind
Maneuver Type: Special
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 15, Swordsage 15
While this counter is active you gain +9 on all saves. Uses one maneuver point per round.

zhCN: 白鸦啸令
enGB: White Raven Call

zhCN:
流派：白鸦
武技类别:强化技
需求武术家等级：军道之剑 17
你和60尺内的盟友在攻击检定、伤害检定、防御等级、豁免和战技防御上获得+5士气加值，持续一轮。
enGB:
Discipline: White Raven
Maneuver Type: Boost
Required Initiater Level: Warblade 17
You and allies within 60 feet gain a +5 morale bonus on attack rolls, damage rolls, armor class, saves and Combat Maneuver Defense for 1 round.
